attributes.action: Allow families with children under 3 a support bubble
attributes.additional_details:
To ensure that familes with small children are given the opportunity to be less isolated during the outbreak. As many familys have a full time working parent and one parent to stay at home to support their small children are at risk of post natal depression or depression and anxiety. 
But giving them a support bubble it allows parents a restbite to maintain their mental health.
attributes.background: I would like the government to allow families with children under the age of 3 a support bubble even of they are not a single household during the covid outbreak.

rejection.details:
